name: Radical Vitality
description:
After this character deals or takes Elemental DMG: Gain 1 stack of Radical Vitality. (Max 3 stacks)
End Phase: If Radical Vitality stacks reach the maximum limit, they will be cleared and the character will lose all Energy.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character deals or takes Elemental DMG:</color> Gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Radical Vitality</color>. (Max 3 stacks)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Radical Vitality</color> stacks reach the maximum limit, they will be cleared and the character will lose all Energy.
